aniball.name: AniBall
aniball.description: Basic but reliable for common Animons.

starball.name: StarBall
starball.description: Shining with stellar power, great for bold and powerful Animons.

megaball.name: MegaBall
megaball.description: Powered up for tougher Animons that resist standard catches.

prismball.name: PrismBall
prismball.description: Crafted for rare Animons that are tricky to spot and catch.

hyperball.name: HyperBall
hyperball.description: Supercharged to capture even the toughest Animons.

abyssball.name: AbyssBall
abyssball.description: Forged from the void, it captures the hardest-to-catch Animons.

omniball.name: OmniBall
omniball.description: The ultimate AniBallâ€”captures any Animon without fail, no exceptions.

forestToken.name: Forest Token
forestToken.description: This token grants {item_encounters} extra chances to encounter wild Animons.

adventureToken.name: Adventure Token
adventureToken.description: This token offers {item_encounters} encounters to find hidden Animons.

mysticToken.name: Mystic Token
mysticToken.description: Infused with ancient magic, it allows {item_encounters} extra encounters.

legendaryToken.name: Legendary Token
legendaryToken.description: This renowned token provides an impressive {item_encounters} encounters.

cake.name: Cake
cake.description: So delicious, it makes any Animon instantly gain a level after a single bite!

cupcake.name: Cupcake
cupcake.description: So delightful, it brings any fainted Animon back to life with its sweetness!

snowdriftDonut.name: Snowdrift Donut
snowdriftDonut.description: Restores {item_value} HP with its delicate white icing.

roseglowDonut.name: Roseglow Donut
roseglowDonut.description: Heals {item_value} HP with its sweet pink charm.

verdantDonut.name: Verdant Donut
verdantDonut.description: Revitalizes {item_value} HP with its refreshing green glaze.

skyshadeDonut.name: Skyshade Donut
skyshadeDonut.description: Replenishes {item_value} HP with its serene blue icing.
